CustomField.formula: TEXT(Drive_OEM__c) + IF( INCLUDES(DAS_SCADA_Provider__c , "Also Energy "), "Also Energy; ","") & IF( INCLUDES( DAS_SCADA_Provider__c , "Ardexa"), "Ardexa; ", "") & IF( INCLUDES(DAS_SCADA_Provider__c , "Campbell Scientific"), "Campbell Scientific; ", "") & IF( INCLUDES(DAS_SCADA_Provider__c , "DAS/SCADA - Onsite"), "DAS/SCADA - Onsite; ", "") & IF( INCLUDES(DAS_SCADA_Provider__c , "DAS/SCADA - Remote "), "DAS/SCADA - Remote; ","") & IF( INCLUDES( DAS_SCADA_Provider__c , "Draker Energy "), "Draker Energy; ", "") & IF( INCLUDES(DAS_SCADA_Provider__c , "Egauge system"), "Egauge system; ", "") & IF( INCLUDES(DAS_SCADA_Provider__c , "ELM"), "ELM; ", "") + TEXT( GB_Data_connection__c ) + TEXT( Bluepoint_data_connection__c ) + TEXT(Bluepoint_site_ID__c) + TEXT(Bluepoint_site_identifier__c)
CustomField.label: Data connection details
